triples.name: Participatory design
triples.relevance: The paper studies participatory technologies which involve citizen engagement through mechanisms like participatory design principles.

triples.name: Survey (human research)
triples.relevance: The paper employs two original survey experiments as its primary research methodology to test political attitudes.

triples.name: Political culture
triples.relevance: The paper examines political attitudes and approval patterns, which are core components of political culture.

triples.name: Direct Line with Vladimir Putin
triples.relevance: The paper empirically tests the impact of the Direct Line participatory technology on political attitudes and support for President Putin.

triples.name: Experimental political science
triples.relevance: The paper proposes novel empirical findings using survey experiments demonstrating that participatory opportunities influence political attitudes independent of government responsiveness.
